data.text:
@PokerPolitics From some of the latest @knowledge_fight podcast Alex seems to warm on China.  Moderna now made the virus.  He's talked about China rebelling against the New World Order.

Seems the zeitgeist is "China is big daddy" may be arising, especially as Russia gets its ass kicked.
@PokerPolitics Ukraine really knocked qanon, convoy, CPAC and all the grifters for a loop. The biggest political clusterf*ck in my lifetime.
@PokerPolitics The ‘wheels within wheels’ are actually square…
@squeak8520 @PokerPolitics China is the new big daddy?

@PokerPolitics "microchips are everywhere and in everything."
 Big if true

@PokerPolitics That's a good one. When he writes "POTUS" does he mean Trump?

How does this movement not fracture into mutually hating enclaves of paranoia and resentment? People's Front of Judea vs Judean People's Front type stuff?

@PokerPolitics I could feel my brain cells crying out as I read this.

So, because Trump rambled about a theoretical invasion of Taiwan, he must be on china’s side (?), and because Taiwan makes microchips, he must be planning to… covid passports… cryptocurrency… something??
@PokerPolitics They don't need to micro chip anyone, most people already have a cell phone lol.
@PokerPolitics Wait, so they're cool with China now??? 🤣🤣🤣 what the ever loving christ lololol
